entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
